---
title: "ftest_offense_vs_composite"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(broom)
setwd("D:/Workspace/STAT107/STAT107-Team22-NBAAnalytics")

df <- read.csv("data/nba_clean.csv")
names(df)

model_composite <- lm(target_variable ~ composite, data=df)

model_offensive <- lm(target_variable ~ composite + offense_model_score, data=df)

model_defensive <- lm(target_variable ~ composite + defensive_model_score, data=df)

ftest_offensive <- anova(model_composite, model_offensive)
tidy(ftest_offensive)

ftest_defensive <- anova(model_composite, model_defensive)
tidy(ftest_defensive)
```
